package data

import (
	"fmt"
	"go/ast"
	"regexp"
	"time"
)

// TestGetterStruct represents a comprehensive test for getter-only functionality
// Tests various types, edge cases, and initialism handling for getter generation
type TestGetterStruct struct {
	// Built-in types
	intField    int     `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetIntField() int { return t.intField }
	floatField  float64 `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetFloatField() float64 { return t.floatField }
	boolField   bool    `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetBoolField() bool { return t.boolField }
	stringField string  `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetStringField() string { return t.stringField }

	// Pointer types
	intPtr    *int     `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetIntPtr() *int { return t.intPtr }
	stringPtr *string  `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetStringPtr() *string { return t.stringPtr }

	// Collection types
	sliceField []string           `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetSliceField() []string { return t.sliceField }
	mapField   map[string]int     `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetMapField() map[string]int { return t.mapField }
	arrayField [5]int             `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetArrayField() [5]int { return t.arrayField }

	// Interface types
	interfaceField interface{}     `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetInterfaceField() interface{} { return t.interfaceField }

	// Custom struct types
	customStruct    TestCustomStruct  `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetCustomStruct() TestCustomStruct { return t.customStruct }
	customStructPtr *TestCustomStruct `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetCustomStructPtr() *TestCustomStruct { return t.customStructPtr }

	// External package types
	timeField time.Time `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetTimeField() time.Time { return t.timeField }
	astFile   ast.File  `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetAstFile() ast.File { return t.astFile }

	// Complex nested types
	sliceOfStructs []TestCustomStruct            `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetSliceOfStructs() []TestCustomStruct { return t.sliceOfStructs }
	mapOfPointers  map[string]*TestCustomStruct  `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetMapOfPointers() map[string]*TestCustomStruct { return t.mapOfPointers }

	// Function types
	funcField func(string) int `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetFuncField() func(string) int { return t.funcField }

	// Channel types
	chanField chan string `property:"get"` // Expected: func (t *TestGetterStruct) GetChanField() chan string { return t.chanField }
}

// TestCustomStruct represents a simple custom type for testing
type TestCustomStruct struct {
	Value string
}
